item.title: CVE-2018-5903|2024-08-05T05:47:56.186Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20consumer%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20industrial%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20voice%20%26%20music
item.description: Out of bounds read occurs due to improper validation of array while processing VDEV stop response from WLAN firmware in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music in MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9640, MDM9650, MSM8996AU, QCS405, QCS605, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 625, SD 636, SD 650/52, SD 675, SD 712 / SD 710 / SD 670, SD 730, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 855, SDA660, SDM630, SDM660, SDX20, SDX24
